text: Peperomia abnormis is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== * Santiana, J. & Pitman, N. 2004. Peperomia abnormis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Peperomia abnormis
